sentences.english: Objective To search for glucosidase inhibitors of various fractions extracted from Mulberry leaves.
sentences.chinese: 目的筛选桑叶中具有糖苷酶抑制活性的组分。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the reason of deafness caused by Aminoglycosides.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨氨基糖苷类抗生素致聋的原因。

sentences.english: The chemical modification of human superoxide dismutase (hSOD) with dextran and ficoll was performed.
sentences.chinese: 应用右旋糖苷及聚蔗糖对人血SOD进行化学修饰。

sentences.english: The synthetic method, main properties and application of alkyl indican has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了烷基糖苷的合成方法，主要性能和用途。

sentences.english: Results The glucosidase inhibitory activities were found in all the constituents of alkaloids, flavones and amyloses , the alkaloid constituent being the…
sentences.chinese: 结论桑叶的降糖作用与各组分的糖苷酶抑制活性有关。

sentences.english: The PCR was performed to determine the genotypes of aminoglycoside-modifying enzymes.
sentences.chinese: PCR法检测氨基糖苷类修饰酶编码基因。

sentences.english: Alpha-transglucosidase is a critical enzyme of producing isomaltooligosaccharide.
sentences.chinese: 转移葡萄糖苷酶是生产低聚异麦芽糖的关键酶。

sentences.english: B was identified as aminoglycoside compound by general analysis method.
sentences.chinese: 常规的理化分析得出B组分为氨基糖苷类化合物。

sentences.english: The rosin-based polyglucoside is one kind of alkyl polyglucoside .
sentences.chinese: 松香基葡萄糖苷为烷基糖苷的一种。

sentences.english: This method is suitable for other aminoglycoside antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 该方法适用于其他氨基糖苷类抗生素。

sentences.english: This is the first report on quercetin glycoside produced by endophytic fungus.
sentences.chinese: 这是关于内生真菌产槲皮素类糖苷的首次报道。

sentences.english: Galactosidase is the key enzyme in the research of B to O blood conversion.
sentences.chinese: 半乳糖苷酶是B→O血型改造研究中的关键工具酶。

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4

definition: old term for 糖苷[tang2 gan1], glycoside
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
pentose (CH2O)5, monosaccharide with five carbon atoms, such as ribose 核糖[he2 tang2]
